mapper.select: SELECT rev.review_id, rev.user_id, rev.review_content AS review_content, rev.created_at, r.restaurant_id, r.name AS restaurant_name, r.jibun_addr, r.food_type, r.phone, r.average_rating, JSON_ARRAYAGG( JSON_OBJECT( 'review_image_id', ri.review_image_id, 'image_url', ri.image_url ) ) AS review_images FROM reviews rev JOIN restaurants r ON rev.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id LEFT JOIN review_images ri ON rev.review_id = ri.review_id WHERE rev.user_id = 1 GROUP BY rev.review_id;
SELECT DISTINCT r.* FROM restaurants r JOIN reviews rev ON rev.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id WHERE rev.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT rev.review_id, u.name AS user_name, rev.review_content, rev.created_at, rrt.report_id, rrt.reason, rrt.report_description, rrt.status FROM review_reports rrt JOIN reviews rev ON rev.review_id = rrt.review_id JOIN users u ON u.user_id = rev.user_id JOIN restaurants r ON r.restaurant_id = rev.restaurant_id WHERE rrt.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT rev.review_id, u.name AS user_name, rev.review_content, rev.created_at, rrt.report_id, rrt.reason, rrt.report_description, rrt.status FROM review_reports rrt JOIN reviews rev ON rev.review_id = rrt.review_id JOIN users u ON u.user_id = rev.user_id JOIN restaurants r ON r.restaurant_id = rev.restaurant_id WHERE r.restaurant_id = #{restaurant_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM helpful_votes WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND state = 1;
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId};
